text: Hi guys. I’m trying to build a differentiable physics simulator using Zygote and am running into a lot of LoadErrors and type errors.

text: Hey <@U018F5W2H24>, Thanks for asking this question. Is it okay if we cross post this to Discourse for further visibility and in case someone has the same question in the future? Thank you for being here!
